item.title: Human Motion Control of Quadrupedal Robots using Deep Reinforcement Learning
HarryPotterChess
item.description: This is a final project of the lecture “Computer Graphics” at POSTECH, 2018.

item.title: Hand Control Project
item.description: Hand manipulation project before jump into Human Motion Control of Quadrupedal Robots using Deep Reinforcement Learning project, 2019.

item.title: Animation- Water Ball Header Project
item.description: Water-ball header motion from the show “Infinite Challenge” for “Advanced Computer Animation” lecture, 2019.

item.title: Improved Artistic Style Transferred(AST) video by Panorama and Layer Separation
item.description: The artistic style transferred video using “Starry Starry Night” by Van Gogh, 2016.

item.title: Improved Color Palette Extraction from Pictures
item.description: This project develops improved color palette extraction from images, 2017.

item.title: The House of Dust
item.description: We aim to design a building that can be adaptable for the Mars environment, 2018

item.title: About
item.description: Sunwoo Kim is a Ph.D. student at Seoul National University(SNU) advised by Professor Jehee Lee. Also, he is co-advised by Professor Sehoon Ha since 2020 unofficially. He received a B.Sc from the Pohang University of Science and Technology. His main research interest lies on connecting computer animation to the robotics but not limited to the certain fields. He is craving for defining exciting research questions and solving it with various methods.
